an5.216:4.3: Bahuno janassa appiyo hoti amanāpo, luddo ca hoti, vippaṭisārī ca, sammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ nirayaṃ upapajjati.
an5.216:4.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ādīnavā akkhantiyā.
an5.216:5.3: Bahuno janassa piyo hoti manāpo, aluddo ca hoti, avippaṭisārī ca, asammūḷho kālaṃ karoti, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati.
an5.216:5.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, pañca ānisaṃsā khantiyā”ti.
